example.en: A religion that uses fear as a motivator is not a good religion.

example.en: When it comes to sports, John is very good.

example.en: I think thats a very good idea of myself.

example.en: He may not be a regular churchgoer, but he's a good man, my son.

example.en: The ones where we can do a lot of good rather than a little good.

example.en: Another important matter to remember is the value of a good wife.
